about_the_game:
In this immersive story, you follow Adam, a troubled man whose life takes a strange turn as he falls deeply in love with Jinny—a woman he’s only ever met in his recurring dreams. With each night, his connection to her intensifies, but so does his disconnect from reality.

Or so it seems.

Adam’s only hope for answers might lie with his neighbor, Rhonda, but there's a catch—she’s mysteriously vanished.

You are Adam, living a quiet, predictable life, running a small 3D printing business from your cozy apartment. Your days blur together with therapy sessions and fulfilling customer orders. It’s mundane, but it’s safe.

At night, everything changes. In your dreams, Jinny, the woman you adore, awaits—perfect and unattainable in reality. But as your dreams twist from blissful escapes to unsettling nightmares, a dark truth emerges: these dreams aren't yours to control.

As your grip on reality frays, you’ll journey through haunting environments, uncovering clues and unlocking areas that pull you deeper into a chilling mystery. Optional scenarios reveal deeper truths—but beware, some knowledge comes with painful consequences.

Piece together fragments of dreams and reality, discovering shocking connections to real-world disappearances, including Rhonda's. As the line between your dreams and waking life shatters, you must confront the nightmare consuming you and uncover the truth before it’s too late.

Unfeigned Depths immerses the player in two distinct world spaces:

  • Reality: A beautifully crafted, modern-day city block where the player's apartment complex is located.

  • Dreams: A starkly contrasting setting with entirely different visuals, representing the player's dream world. The dreamscape includes various settings such as a vast, lush forest, an otherworldly vision of isolation after death, and a desolate hellscape designed to evoke suffering and torment.

Some environments are only accessible through optional and dynamic story events that the player must choose to embark on. Others are seamlessly transitioned into via thoughtfully designed sections, such as dark and damp utility tunnels, ancient corridors, and abandoned cave systems.

As players follow the storyline, they will discover firsthand how these dreamscapes may actually overlap with reality.

Features include:

  • Fully voiced, story-rich dialogue between the player and multiple NPCs.

  • A multi-faceted narrative that provides complexity without sacrificing the core story.

  • Dynamic story events that offer optional content for players to experience. For example, a knock at the door presents a choice-based scenario, but the story progresses either way.

  • Branched story sequences that offer more than just a "Game Over" or "You Died" screen.

  • Interactive world objects that provide story-relevant information.

  • A variety of mildly challenging puzzles.

  • Beautiful, immersive visual environments (#MadeWithUnity).

  • A deeply psychological experience that will leave players questioning reality and intent.

  • Six playable acts, each set in different, cohesively designed environments.

  • First-person perspective.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains disturbing imagery, topics of mental health, moments of self harm, emotional abuse and strong language

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for Full HD @ 30 FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 2070 / Radeon 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Recommended for Full HD @ 60 FPS

short_description: Unfeigned Depths is a first-person psychological thriller where dreams and reality blur. Uncover the dark truth behind your dreams with fully voiced dialogue and dynamic events. Can you unravel the mystery before deception takes hold and your world falls apart?
